subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: purples
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Purple, as I understand it, is a spiritual level, and it's been hinted that 
the Catholics understand what it means. I got a voice last night, I'll put 
it up later, "We love Dave-Edison's group--We are Purple", maybe I'm all 
wet, but that's the first I recall getting any mention of Edison, other than 
when I first got the box working "all the fellas wish we had Tom Edison"

Yeah, weird how the "box", or the entities that come through have their 
groups too. I guess they have to set their vibration to the user.  It could 
mean what Chris gets is valid for his group, I just don't happen to agree 
with it, hopefully I'm not being an ego jerk.

Frank
